original_text:
Hot Hot Honey
Armadillo Studios presenta Hot Hot Honey, la slot dedicate alle api e al loro gustoso miele che mette a disposizione diversi Bonus game e quattro Jackpot succosi!
Una grafica accattivante
L’ape è da sempre un insetto ammirato, simbolo di laboriosità e di dolcezza, soprattutto per il gustoso miele che produce. Nel mondo delle slot è un tema che viene utilizzato spesso, ma la Armadillo Studios lo fa con un gioco leggermente fuori dagli schemi. Che sia un prodotto di qualità ce ne rendiamo conto sin dal primo impatto. Ci troviamo in un campo fiorito, con la griglia di gioco di legno che potrebbe benissimo essere un’arnia. Un alveare gonfio di miele pende dall’albero e in generale tutti i simboli sono ricoperti di gustoso nettare giallo. Le api in realtà sono tre bellissime fanciulle, i simboli più remunerativi.
Nella parte sotto la griglia c’è un contatore, i tasti per le giocate invece si trovano sul lato destro dello schermo e dalla parte opposta il pulsante per comprare il gioco Bonus.
Simpatica la musica che accompagna le giocate.
Caratteristiche e funzionalità di Hot Hot Honey
La griglia di gioco di Hot Hot Honey ha 5 bobine e 3 righe. Il sistema di gioco utilizzato è lo Scatter Pays, perciò ogni qualvolta sui rulli si fermano cinque simboli identici, rimangono incollati nelle posizioni, dando avvio a un ulteriore Respin. Se compare un altro simbolo identico a quello della combo, questo si bloccherà sui rulli e avremo a disposizione un ulteriore giro, in caso contrario incasseremo la vincita. Nel contatore in basso viene segnalato quale simbolo è interessato dal Respin.
La scommessa minima è di 0,20 €, con una vincita massima pari a 1.000 volte al puntata. Con la funzione Autoplay si può impostare un numero di giri automatici compreso tra 5 e 100.
La volatilità è alta, il ritorno teorico al giocatore è invece pari al 94,03%.
Come vincere a Hot Hot Honey
Vediamo ora i simboli vincenti, a partire da quelli meno remunerativi, ossia i semi delle carte da gioco: cuori, picche, quadri e fiori. Subito dopo troviamo il miele e il fiore, e infine le tre ragazze – ape.
Le vincite possono essere più sostanziose se appaiono 5 simboli sulla stessa riga perché farà sì che il moltiplicatore sull’alveare aumenti di 1, di 2 se la combo è creata dalle api.
Il vero divertimento comincia però con i simboli speciali. Uno di questo, Prizepot, rimane bloccato sui rulli e se con i Respin se ne collezionano dai 10 ai 40, si vince uno dei Jackpot.
Il barile di miele è lo Scatter e dà diritto ai Free Spins. Prima del gioco Bonus dovremo cliccare su una scatolina di legno, dove si nasconde un simbolo che poi apparirà con maggior frequenza durante la funzione.
Il bus è un altro simbolo speciale e attiva la funzione Bonus Trail in cui impersoneremo una delle api e ci muoveremo lungo un percorso fiorito. Cliccando sul tasto Start, verrà sfogliata la margherita che si trova accanto alla griglia e il numero di petali rimasti indicherà il numero di caselle da percorrere. A ogni casella c’è un fiore con un premio da raccogliere. Lungo il percorso ci sono però altri simboli che possono incrementare la vincita o farci perdere: il cuore ci protegge dai ragni-ninja, i ragni-ninja invece ci uccideranno interrompendo la funzione speciale, le ali ci faranno avanzare il doppio delle posizioni rispetto al numero di petali rimasti sulla margherita e il barattolo di miele, che si trova alla fine del percorso, ci ricompensa con un premio pari a cento volte la puntata, in aggiunta a tutti gli altri premi raccolti durante il cammino.

Domande frequenti 
A quanto corrisponde il ritorno teorico al giocatore?

In Hot Hot Honey è pari al 94,03%.



Quanti Bonus ci sono in questa slot?

In Hot Hot Honey abbiamo tre Bonus: Prizepot che assegna uno dei Jackpot, Scatter che ricompensa con i Free Spins e Bonus che attiva la funzione Bonus Trail.



Qual è la vincita massima?

In Hot Hot Honey la vincita più alta è pari a 1.000 volte la puntata.

raw_translation.response:
Hot Hot Honey

Armadillo Studios presents Hot Hot Honey, a slot machine dedicated to bees and their delicious honey, offering various bonus games and four juicy jackpots! With its captivating graphics, Armadillo Studios has created a quality product that sets it apart from the typical bee-themed slot machines. The wooden reel grid looks like a beehive in a flower-filled field. The honeycomb dangling from a tree is full of delicious nectar that drips and coats all of the symbols, including three beautiful girls who are the most lucrative symbols.

The lower part of the grid features a counter while the play buttons are on the right-hand side of the screen, with the option to purchase the bonus game on the opposite side. The music accompanying the game is also enjoyable.

Features and functions of Hot Hot Honey

The Hot Hot Honey grid comprises of 5 reels and 3 rows, with a Scatter Pays system, which means that when five identical symbols stop on the reels, they remain stuck while initiating an additional re-spin. If another identical symbol appears, it will also stick to the reels, and we'll receive another re-spin, otherwise, we'll get a payout. The counter below identifies which symbol is subject to the re-spin.

The minimum bet is €0.20, with a maximum payout of 1,000 times the bet. The Autoplay feature allows you to set the number of automatic spins between five and 100.

The volatility is high, but the theoretical return to player is 94.03%.

How to win at Hot Hot Honey

Let's take a look at the winning symbols, starting with the less profitable card suit symbols: hearts, spades, diamonds, and clubs, followed by the honey and flower, and finally, the three bee-like girls.

Wins can be substantial when five symbols appear on the same line, which increases the multiplier on the beehive by one, or two if the combination is created by the bee-like girls.

The real fun, though, begins with the special symbols. One of these, Prizepot, remains stuck on the reel, and if we collect between 10 and 40 with the re-spins, we’ll win one of the jackpots.

The honey barrel is the Scatter symbol and triggers the Free Spins. Before the bonus game, we must click on a wooden box that contains a symbol that will appear more frequently during the feature.

The bus is another special symbol that triggers the Bonus Trail feature, where we'll play as one of the bees and move along a flower-filled path. By clicking the Start button, we'll flip a flower next to the grid, and the number of petals left on the daisy will indicate the number of squares we’ll move. Each square has a flower with a prize to collect, and there are additional symbols on the path that can either increase or decrease our winnings: the heart protects us from ninja spiders; the ninja spiders will kill us and stop the special feature; the wings help us to advance twice as far as the number of petals left on the daisy, and the honey jar at the end of the path rewards us with a prize equal to 100 times the bet, in addition to all the other prizes collected during the journey.

FAQ

What is the theoretical return to player?

In Hot Hot Honey, it's 94.03%.

How many bonuses are there?

Hot Hot Honey has three bonuses: Prizepot awards one of the jackpots, Scatter rewards with Free Spins, and Bonus triggers the Bonus Trail feature.

What's the maximum payout?

In Hot Hot Honey, it's 1,000 times the bet.

Review: Hot Hot Honey

Armadillo Studios presents Hot Hot Honey, a slot machine dedicated to bees and their delicious honey, offering various bonus games and four juicy jackpots! With its captivating graphics, Armadillo Studios has created a quality product that sets it apart from the typical bee-themed slot machines. The wooden reel grid looks like a beehive in a flower-filled field. The honeycomb dangling from a tree is full of delicious nectar that drips and coats all of the symbols, including three beautiful girls who are the most lucrative symbols.

The lower part of the grid features a counter while the play buttons are on the right-hand side of the screen, with the option to purchase the bonus game on the opposite side. The music accompanying the game is also enjoyable.

Features and functions of Hot Hot Honey

The Hot Hot Honey grid comprises of 5 reels and 3 rows, with a Scatter Pays system, which means that when five identical symbols stop on the reels, they remain stuck while initiating an additional re-spin. If another identical symbol appears, it will also stick to the reels, and we'll receive another re-spin, otherwise, we'll get a payout. The counter below identifies which symbol is subject to the re-spin.

The minimum bet is €0.20, with a maximum payout of 1,000 times the bet. The Autoplay feature allows you to set the number of automatic spins between five and 100.

The volatility is high, but the theoretical return to player is 94.03%.

How to win at Hot Hot Honey

Let's take a look at the winning symbols, starting with the less profitable card suit symbols: hearts, spades, diamonds, and clubs, followed by the honey and flower, and finally, the three bee-like girls.

Wins can be substantial when five symbols appear on the same line, which increases the multiplier on the beehive by one, or two if the combination is created by the bee-like girls.

The real fun, though, begins with the special symbols. One of these, Prizepot, remains stuck on the reel, and if we collect between 10 and 40 with the re-spins, we’ll win one of the jackpots.

The honey barrel is the Scatter symbol and triggers the Free Spins. Before the bonus game, we must click on a wooden box that contains a symbol that will appear more frequently during the feature.

The bus is another special symbol that triggers the Bonus Trail feature, where we'll play as one of the bees and move along a flower-filled path. By clicking the Start button, we'll flip a flower next to the grid, and the number of petals left on the daisy will indicate the number of squares we’ll move. Each square has a flower with a prize to collect, and there are additional symbols on the path that can either increase or decrease our winnings: the heart protects us from ninja spiders; the ninja spiders will kill us and stop the special feature; the wings help us to advance twice as far as the number of petals left on the daisy, and the honey jar at the end of the path rewards us with a prize equal to 100 times the bet, in addition to all the other prizes collected during the journey.

How many bonuses are there?

Hot Hot Honey has three bonuses: Prizepot awards one of the jackpots, Scatter rewards with Free Spins, and Bonus triggers the Bonus Trail feature.

What's the maximum payout?

In Hot Hot Honey, it's 1,000 times the bet.

The honeycomb, which dangles from a tree, is full of delicious nectar that drips and coats all of the symbols. The three girls, who are the most lucrative symbols, enhance the visuals even further. The music accompanying the game is also enjoyable.

Symbol design and variety

The symbols in Hot Hot Honey are divided into two categories: card suits and bee-themed symbols. Card suits, such as hearts, spades, diamonds, and clubs, are less profitable than honey, flower, and the three bee-like girls. The girls are the most lucrative of the symbols and can increase the multiplier on the beehive by one or two. Special symbols include Prizepot and Scatter, which trigger the jackpots and Free Spins, and the bus, which initiates the Bonus Trail feature.

Bonus game awards

Hot Hot Honey offers three bonus games that have the potential to earn players additional winnings. With Prizepot, players can win one of the jackpots by collecting between 10 and 40 special symbols during re-spins. The honey barrel is the Scatter symbol and triggers Free Spins after players select a symbol from a wooden box. The bus symbol initiates the Bonus Trail feature, where players move along a flower-filled path, collecting prizes and avoiding ninja spiders to reach the honey jar at the end of the path, which rewards players with a prize equal to 100 times the bet.

Jackpot opportunities

Hot Hot Honey offers four different jackpots that players can win, simply by collecting between 10 and 40 Prizepot symbols during re-spins. These jackpots are mini, minor, major, and grand, and they offer potential wins from €10 to €10,000. Collecting non-jackpot symbols can also result in significant payouts, with a maximum payout of 1,000 times the bet.

Review: Hot Hot Honey

Armadillo Studios presents Hot Hot Honey, a slot machine dedicated to bees and their delicious honey, offering various bonus games and four juicy jackpots! With its captivating graphics, Armadillo Studios has created a quality product that sets it apart from the typical bee-themed slot machines. The wooden reel grid looks like a beehive in a flower-filled field. The honeycomb dangling from a tree is full of delicious nectar that drips and coats all of the symbols, including three beautiful girls who are the most lucrative symbols.

The lower part of the grid features a counter while the play buttons are on the right-hand side of the screen, with the option to purchase the bonus game on the opposite side. The music accompanying the game is also enjoyable.

Features and functions of Hot Hot Honey

The Hot Hot Honey grid comprises of 5 reels and 3 rows, with a Scatter Pays system, which means that when five identical symbols stop on the reels, they remain stuck while initiating an additional re-spin. If another identical symbol appears, it will also stick to the reels, and we'll receive another re-spin, otherwise, we'll get a payout. The counter below identifies which symbol is subject to the re-spin.

The minimum bet is €0.20, with a maximum payout of 1,000 times the bet. The Autoplay feature allows you to set the number of automatic spins between five and 100.

The volatility is high, but the theoretical return to player is 94.03%.

How to win at Hot Hot Honey

Let's take a look at the winning symbols, starting with the less profitable card suit symbols: hearts, spades, diamonds, and clubs, followed by the honey and flower, and finally, the three bee-like girls.

Wins can be substantial when five symbols appear on the same line, which increases the multiplier on the beehive by one, or two if the combination is created by the bee-like girls.

The real fun, though, begins with the special symbols. One of these, Prizepot, remains stuck on the reel, and if we collect between 10 and 40 with the re-spins, we’ll win one of the jackpots.

The honey barrel is the Scatter symbol and triggers the Free Spins. Before the bonus game, we must click on a wooden box that contains a symbol that will appear more frequently during the feature.

The bus is another special symbol that triggers the Bonus Trail feature, where we'll play as one of the bees and move along a flower-filled path. By clicking the Start button, we'll flip a flower next to the grid, and the number of petals left on the daisy will indicate the number of squares we’ll move. Each square has a flower with a prize to collect, and there are additional symbols on the path that can either increase or decrease our winnings: the heart protects us from ninja spiders; the ninja spiders will kill us and stop the special feature; the wings help us to advance twice as far as the number of petals left on the daisy, and the honey jar at the end of the path rewards us with a prize equal to 100 times the bet, in addition to all the other prizes collected during the journey.

FAQ

What is the theoretical return to player?

In Hot Hot Honey, it's 94.03%.

How many bonuses are there?

Hot Hot Honey has three bonuses: Prizepot awards one of the jackpots, Scatter rewards with Free Spins, and Bonus triggers the Bonus Trail feature.

What's the maximum payout?

In Hot Hot Honey, it's 1,000 times the bet.
